tafsirQuiz.question: Which important teaching is conveyed in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: These observations clearly establish that the Creator of the universe is all-knowing and all-aware. A study of the universe reveals that its creation has been effected gradually in a phased manner

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Fussilat, Ayah 15?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Man is living in a world where the vastness of heaven and earth negates the greatness of man; where the event of death proves that man is a non-entity and truly powerless

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: It is stated in the Quran that on the Day of Judgement a man’s skin, ears, eyes and limbs will testify to his deeds. It has now been discovered that every utterance a man makes is recorded on the skin of his body and that it can be heard once again, just like a voice recorded by mechanical devices

tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Fussilat, Ayah 25?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: In the present world, on the one hand, there are preachers of God who advise or instruct a man about the Truth. On the other hand, there are leaders who exploit people by making such speeches as please them

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: A man should worship the Creator and not His creations. In ancient times, the sun, the moon and stars appeared quite dazzling to man, so he took them as deities and started worshipping them

tafsirQuiz.question: Which important teaching is conveyed in this ayah?

tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The springing of a fruit from a tree or the emerging of a live being from the womb of a mother is in essence the same as the emergence of the world of the Hereafter from the present world

tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The story of all the people inhabiting this world is the story of the present.
